content:
is there a way, in the java fhir mapping language reference implementation to pass in or lookup external data for the purposes of enriching the output?

for example, if i want to know the hostname of the system that did the transform, is there a way to pass it in or look it up without hard coding it into the map file? or get the current date?
i think maybe i could use the translate functionality, but that seems like a misuse. related, is there a way to use the -tx terminology server as a variable in the map? right now i have my server value hard coded in some of my translate calls

i'm quite new to the mapping language and FHIR in general, so i could be missing something very simple
i found the FHIR Path docs and the section about variables, and i got the %loinc expansion working, but i'd like to extend that pattern for arbitrary inputs, if possible
